name: Intercontinental Balistic Dice
description:
Controlls: R to restart lvl, WASD or arrows to move

One roll of the dice and it's all over.

 Intercontinental Ballistic Dice is a sokoban-style game where your objective is to stop the evil attempts of an evil king and save the world from his deadly roll of the dice.

 Do you have what it takes to conquer evil?

 New content coming soon:

 https://youtube.com/channel/UCxfZljLpcILNkd8rrgJaXRw

 Hope you like it
Programing: Junj;

Arts and music: Ribvitot;

Obs: After "kinda" each roll, the range of the dice decreases. (Useful information)
